Posts.Content: Hey just found out a few days ago I have prostate cancer. Waiting to get a bone scan then start radiation treatments and some kind of shots. Can anyone help me as to what to expect and how deadly is it please? Didn't get much info yet from my doctor. Not sure if I should just have it removed or go with the radiation. Any help will be appreciated Thanks
Posts.Title: Just Found Out

Posts.Content: Hey thanks guys My age is 57 PSA was up to 33 My Gleason Score was 4+5=9 Doctor said it was a very aggressive kind of cancer He wants me to get a bone scan and do radiation treatments and some kind of injections left prostate 8 white soft gray-white specimens 0.3 to 1.5 cm in length ts3 right side biopsy 8 soft gray-white specimens 0.3 to 2.5 cm in length ts 3 left prostate gland tumor is present in one of 6 cores rep 10% right tumor is present in 3 of 7 cores rep 30% About all I have right now for info on my biopsy any help I can get I would appreciate Thanks all for welcoming me to the forum
Posts.Title: Just Found Out

Posts.Title: Just Found Out

Posts.Content: Thanks very much for you help. Might go down to John Hopkins problem being I weight over 400 lbs and finding a doctor who will work on me is hard. Thought about CTCA but closes one is in Phily Still waiting to see if they are going to be able to do a bone scan on me or not. Thanks Good luck to all my new friends
